name: Cat Herder (10 Games in 10 Weeks)
description:
Cat Herder is exactly what is sounds like, a video game about herding cats!

Carry your feline friends into the target zones and do your best to make sure they stay there.  Use treats to buy yourself time and keep them from wandering off!

This is the ninth entry in my 10 Games in 10 Weeks challenge.  Follow me on Twitter for daily progress updates!
